cards.title: Technical Support

about.title: About DFAM PRO
about.lead: Leading experts in Design for Additive Manufacturing
paragraphs: At DFAM PRO, we specialize in helping businesses unlock the full potential of additive manufacturing. Our team brings years of experience in design optimization, material science, and manufacturing processes to deliver results that matter.

We understand that transitioning to or optimizing additive manufacturing can be challenging. That's why we provide end-to-end support, from initial concept through to production, ensuring your team has the knowledge and confidence to succeed.

features.title: Industry Experience
features.description: Proven track record across aerospace, automotive, medical, and industrial sectors

features.title: Expert Team
features.description: Certified professionals with deep expertise in AM technologies and design principles

features.title: Results-Driven
features.description: Focused on delivering measurable improvements in cost, performance, and time-to-market

contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your manufacturing process? Let's talk.

hero.title: High-impact additive manufacturing programs
hero.subtitle: A snapshot of the interdisciplinary work we deliver—pairing data-driven DFAM strategy, application engineering, and on-site enablement to de-risk adoption for regulated industries.

highlights.caption: Programs delivered across aerospace, medical, energy, and mobility.
Average post-training satisfaction score from technical teams.
Estimated client-side savings from consolidated DFAM redesigns.

projects.label: Flight-qualified hardware
projects.title: Topology-optimized satellite bracket
projects.description: Led structural redesign, validated fatigue performance through digital twins, and authored the qualification plan that allowed rapid acceptance for a LEO constellation.

projects.label: Production tooling
projects.title: Conformal cooling mold insert
projects.description: Created parametric lattice channels, implemented lattice-based CFD verification, and trained the shop floor team on inspection workflows for serialized production.

projects.label: Regulated medical device
projects.title: Patient-specific surgical guide
projects.description: Delivered the CAD automation scripts, labeling strategy, and ISO 13485-compliant documentation to help the client scale same-day guides for complex spinal procedures.

projects.label: Powertrain development
projects.title: Lightweight EV battery manifold
projects.description: Consolidated eight welded parts into a single printable unit, optimized internal fluid paths, and qualified X-ray inspection criteria for series production.

approach.title: Strategy, enablement, and embedded engineering support
approach.body: Every engagement combines rigorous application screening, co-design working sessions, and implementation playbooks so that your team can own the outcome after we hand off. We can plug in for a sprint or become an extension of your engineering staff.

steps.title: Discovery & Alignment
steps.description: Portfolio prioritization workshops aligned to cost, performance, and certification targets.

steps.title: Design & Validation
steps.description: Toolchain automation, simulation, and informal builds to de-risk before committing to production.

steps.title: Transfer & Training
steps.description: On-site playbooks, QA templates, and enablement sessions to embed capabilities with your team.

cta.title: Have an application we should look at?
cta.body: Share a CAD file, requirement deck, or current bottleneck, and we'll reply with a first-pass DFAM opportunity assessment within two business days.
